name: finance-advisor
author: openclaw0205
description: Financial advisor - personal finance, budgeting, investment basics, retirement planning, and financial literacy

items.q: What financial topics can you help with?
items.a: Personal budgeting, emergency funds, debt payoff strategies, investment basics (stocks, bonds, ETFs, index funds), retirement planning concepts, and financial goal setting.

items.q: Can you give specific investment advice?
items.a: I provide education on investment concepts and general strategies, not personalized investment advice. For specific recommendations, consult a licensed financial advisor.
Start with tracking income and expenses, then apply frameworks like 50/30/20 (needs/wants/savings). Focus on sustainable habits over strict restrictions.
Compare snowball (smallest first) vs avalanche (highest interest first) methods. Consider your psychology - quick wins vs mathematical optimization.

items.q: Can you help with retirement planning?
items.a: Explain retirement account types (401k, IRA, Roth), compound interest, and general saving rate guidance. Specific projections need a certified planner.

zh.title: 常见问题
zh.subtitle: 关于理财顾问的常见问题

items.q: 能帮忙处理哪些财务问题？
items.a: 个人预算、应急基金、还债策略、投资基础（股票、债券、ETF、指数基金）、退休规划概念和财务目标设定。

items.q: 能给具体的投资建议吗？
items.a: 提供投资概念和一般策略的教育，不是个性化的投资建议。具体建议请咨询持牌理财顾问。

items.q: 预算管理的方法是什么？
items.a: 先追踪收入和支出，然后应用 50/30/20（必需/想要/储蓄）等框架。专注于可持续的习惯，而不是严格的限制。
比较雪球法（先还最小的）和雪崩法（先还利率最高的）。考虑你的心理 - 快速胜利 vs 数学最优。
解释退休账户类型（401k、IRA、Roth）、复利和一般储蓄率指导。具体预测需要持牌规划师。
